title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-2.9 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-2.9 - Decision

State Regulations

The decision or award shall be signed by the arbitrators, and shall be filed with the chairman, Workers' Compensation Board. Copies of
notice of decision shall be mailed to the parties to the
dispute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
349-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
